plot: Peter and Benni work in the marina. Neither the Beckers nor Mrs. Meinhart and Mrs. Gerlach know where Peter is. It is only through Frank Ulrich that Mrs. Meinhart learns where the boy is. Even Frank can't know that the young people have problems with the police. Meanwhile, Richter's secretary and lover Claudia is putting increasing pressure on her boss. She wants to enjoy the same luxurious standard of living as Vera.
